title: Mushroom And Bacon Breakfast Skillet
summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give Mushroom And Bacon Breakfast Skillet a try. For $3.06 per serving, this recipe covers 25% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One portion of this dish contains around 28g of protein, 53g of fat, and a total of 959 calories. This recipe serves 3. 63 people have tried and liked this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a dairy free diet. Head to the store and pick up mushroom and bacon breakfast skillet, i use every meal as an excuse to bust out a crusty loaf of bread, adapted from tyler florence family meal, and a few other things to make it today. To use up the breakfast syrup you could follow this main course with the Rich Pecan Pie as a dessert. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 76%. This score is solid. Try Bacon, Potato + Poblano Breakfast Skillet, Baked Potato Bacon Egg Breakfast Skillet, and bacon, egg & crispy potato breakfast skillet {one-pan dish} for similar recipes.
instructions: Reduce heat to low or medium-low. Add olive oil to the pan. Crack three eggs into the pan. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cover pan with a lid. After about 3 minutes, check eggs. Cook until theyre reached your desired doneness. I usually cook eggs for about 4 minutes. Remove skillet from heat. Sprinkle the eggs with bacon, mushrooms, and arugula. Add more salt and pepper as necessary and serve immediately. Serve with crusty bread and hot sauce.

steps.step: Reduce heat to low or medium-low.
Add olive oil to the pan. Crack three eggs into the pan.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cover pan with a lid. After about 3 minutes, check eggs. Cook until theyre reached your desired doneness. I usually cook eggs for about 4 minutes.
Sprinkle the eggs with bacon, mushrooms, and arugula.
Add more salt and pepper as necessary and serve immediately.
Serve with crusty bread and hot sauce.
